backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor implementing access control, user profiles, package management, and subscriber/billing data structures with admin/user permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing required frontend changes, associated files, and feature metadata for bulk delete and admin UI updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for multiple frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens, RTL adjustments, and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configured for Arabic language and RTL layout with root container and script loader.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, profile setup, header/navigation, and routing between dashboard, subscribers, and billing pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Login screen prompting unauthenticated users to authenticate using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Reusable login/logout button that triggers Internet Identity authentication and clears React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting first-time users to save their profile with name and phone before accessing the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching the backend actor using the current identity and reinitializing access control when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity React context providing identity state, login, logout, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, admin checks, packages, bulk subscriber import, and deleting subscribers.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark color themes, utilities, and RTL adjustments.
frontend/src/lib/money.ts: Provides helpers for formatting USD amounts and converting numbers to bigint.
frontend/src/lib/placeholderPhone.ts: Detects backend-generated placeholder phone numbers using a simple prefix check.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Validates, sanitizes, and generates WhatsApp URLs and provides a function to open chats.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BillingPage.tsx: Renders a billing UI with month/year filters and placeholder content pending backend implementation.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays a dashboard with date selectors and static billing stats awaiting backend support.
frontend/src/pages/SubscribersPage.tsx: Manages subscribers with bulk import, deletion, package selection, and admin checks using backend mutations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading URL or hash parameters and persisting them in sessionStorage, plus helpers to clear stored or hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, existing features, and pending feature requests for the bulk subscriber deletion project.
